Style/BlockDelimiters.description:
Description

Avoid using {...} for multi-line blocks (multiline chaining is always ugly). Prefer {...} over do...end for single-line blocks.
Style/BlockDelimiters.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: line_count_based (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['line_count_based', 'semantic', 'braces_for_chaining', 'always_braces'] (type: list)
ProceduralMethods: ['benchmark', 'bm', 'bmbm', 'create', 'each_with_object', 'measure', 'new', 'realtime', 'tap', 'with_object'] (type: list)
FunctionalMethods: ['let', 'let!', 'subject', 'watch'] (type: list)
AllowedMethods: ['lambda', 'proc', 'it'] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
AllowBracesOnProceduralOneLiners: False (type: bool)
BracesRequiredMethods: [] (type: list)
